amulet.name: amulet
amulet.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by the Priests of the Cavern of Flame. Seems to help understanding different languages.

moon-wine.name: Moon-wine
moon-wine.description: A gourd of fermented sap from a haunted tree, grown from a seed dropt down by someone on the moon.

silver-key.name: The Silver Key
silver-key.description: A Key that might open something other than a gate.

prismatic-robe.name: Prismatic Robe
prismatic-robe.description: A robe fit for a Pharaoh.

ring-of-zenig.name: Ring of Zenig
ring-of-zenig.description: A ring containing Zenig of Aphorat's skull.

golden-chain.name: Golden Chain
golden-chain.description: An ornate chain that improves magic at the cost of speed.

pnakotic-manuscripts.name: Pnakotic Manuscripts
pnakotic-manuscripts.description: The sacred texts revered by the city of Ulthar.

ruby-bottle.name: Ruby bottle
ruby-bottle.description: A bottle made from a single hollowed ruby, grotesquely carved in patterns too fabulous to be comprehended.

ornate-tombstone.name: Ornate Tombstone
ornate-tombstone.description: A tombstone with angels and cross engravings. Seems to have an effect on netherworld denizens.

ivory-flute.name: Ivory Flute
ivory-flute.description: A disgustingly carved flute that emits loathsome sounds. Might cause confusion.

ivory-claws.name: Ivory Claws
ivory-claws.description: Claws made from moon ivory. Might cause confusion.

milk.name: Milk
milk.description: Sweet milk from Ulthar that restores 50HP. Cats love it.
